name: Unstable Alchemy
description:
What would you do if a TROLL stood between you and a good night's sleep?
Solve riddles and mix potions to make your way home.

How to play
1. Solve the riddle
2. Mix the right colour potion
3. Drag the potion to the potion silhouette

Made for Ludum Dare 49. Theme: Unstable

Please rate! https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/49/unstable-alchemy-2

Note: The explosion doesn't appear on the html build due to a bug; however, you may experience it in the downloadable version.
